law.catch_line: A resolution or ordinance that authorizes a local obligation shall contain:...

text.section: A provision under subsection (a)(5) of this section is a covenant binding the issuer to provide the money from the specified source or sources when principal and interest become due and payable.

section.section: A local obligation that an issuer issues under this part shall have all the attributes of a negotiable instrument under Article 31, § 8 of the Code.
The principal of and interest on a local obligation in the hands of its owner are exempt from taxation by the State or a political subdivision.
